articles.description: Follow live coverage as Britain's Keely Hodgkinson, Jemma Reekie and the relay teams bid for medals on the final day in Budapest.
articles.title: World Athletics: Hodgkinson in 800m final & GB in relays - TV & text

articles.description: Watch live coverage and follow text and radio commentary from finals day in the 2023 Hundred at Lord's.
articles.title: The Hundred: Southern Brave face Northern Superchargers in final

articles.description: Norway's Viktor Hovland takes a healthy lead into the final round of the PGA Tour's season-ending tournament at East Lake in Atlanta.
articles.title: Tour Championship - Hovland leads by six in final round

articles.description: Darwin Nunez scores a late double to snatch ten-man Liverpool three points at Newcastle.
articles.title: Nunez double grabs 10-man Liverpool win at Newcastle

articles.description: Great Britain's Keely Hodgkinson wins her second consecutive silver medal in the 800m at the World Athletics Championships as Kenya's Mary Moraa takes gold.
articles.title: GB's Hodgkinson wins 800m silver as Moraa takes gold

articles.description: Keely Hodgkinson is forced to settle for silver as Kenya's Mary Moraa triumphs in a thrilling 800m final at the World Championships.
articles.title: Hodgkinson takes Worlds silver in thrilling 800m

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen survives losing the lead in early rain and a red flag for a late torrential downpour to take victory in a chaotic Dutch Grand Prix.
articles.title: Verstappen wins chaotic Dutch GP to equal record

articles.description: Watch highlights as Southern Brave beat the Northern Superchargers by 34 runs at Lords to win the women's Hundred in captain Anya Shrubsole's final game.
articles.title: Southern Brave win women's Hundred - highlights

articles.description: An internal investigation is launched at Spain's football federation after its Sexual Violence Protocol is activated.
articles.title: Spanish FA launches investigation into Rubiales kiss

articles.description: Aston Villa's team bus is attacked following the game at Burnley, causing significant damage but no injuries.
articles.title: Aston Villa team bus attacked after win at Burnley
